title: At highway intersections with two right turn only lanes, is it legal for cars with a red light in the left lane to turn right after first stopping at the intersection? One example of this type of intersection would be the northbound exit ramp from College Road where two lanes must turn right onto Market Street.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/09/2-right-turn-lanes-can-take-right-red/
